kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Intensive workouts & individual training plans | FREELETICS'.

Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight) Without any arguments.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//h1[contains(text(), 'QA Engineer (all genders) - Remote or Munich')]'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//h2[contains(text(), 'Your Responsibilities')]' contains exact text 'Your Responsibilities'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Switch Window
kw.arg: Freeletics - QA Engineer (all genders) - Remote or Munich
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.
